name: CryptoMarket|150+Cryptocurrency
0:
”Alexa, open crypto market”
”Alexa, ask crypto market to get BTC price in EUR”
”Alexa, ask crypto market to get SHIB price in USD multiplied by ten thousand with two decimals”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto market
des:
Get real-time price of the cryptocurrency market, directly from Alexa device. It supports more than 150 cryptocurrencies in 300+ currencies from coinbase's market. For instance, say "Alexa, ask crypto market to get BTC price in EUR". By default, the currency is set to USD.

The skill also supports a customized configured crypto price result, using multipliers or the number of decimals you want to hear from Alexa, like this one: "Alexa, ask crypto market to get SHIB price in USD multiplied by 10000 with 2 decimals".

As the cryptocurrency and currency values are not very easy to tell to Alexa device, I strongly recommend you to use the skill in an Alexa routine, by adding a customized Alexa action with the crypto market you want to know about, like "Alexa, ask crypto market to get SHIB price in USD multiplied by 10000 with 2 decimals".

If Alexa couldn't find your favorite cryptocurrency, please send me a feedback, in order to update the cryptocurrency list.

Please leave a Review and share this Skill with everyone.
Feel free to contact me if you have any suggestions: catalin.moldovan97@icloud.com

Note
------
- Real-time cryptocurrency price is provided by coinbase's market.
- It is not intended for commercial use and provider/author is not responsible for your crypto investment decisions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
